column5: Sorry to hear that. My deepest condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss Cliff.
So very sorry for your loss Cliff.
very sad news!  I am so sorry for your loss.

Just home from the lake Cliff and not the first thing I wanted to read.  So sorry to hear of Sue's passing. I know there are lots of memories to keep you moving forward, but be sure to fill that now vacant feeling with family and friends.  Wayne
Just back on after a long absence from the board and this is the first thing i saw, I'm so sorry Cliff.  My deepest condolences to you and your family.
Condolences. May the Lord grant you comfort.
Very sorry to hear that, my condolences.

Cliff, I'm sorry I missed this. Just seeing it tonight. So sad to read this. I only know you through your posts over the many years, but I have no doubt how much Sue meant to you, and you to her. As we get older, this is one of the biggest fears I have. To lose your soul mate is devastating, but I'm sure your family, friends, and neighbours will be there for you. Be well Cliff and my deepest condolences to you. Brian

Cliff, I'm sorry I missed this. Just seeing it tonight. So sad to read this. I only know you through your posts over the many years, but I have no doubt how much Sue meant to you, and you to her. As we get older, this is one of the biggest fears I have. To lose your soul mate is devastating, but I'm sure your family, friends, and neighbours will be there for you. Be well Cliff and my deepest condolences to you. Brian  I as well missed this event as I was off of the forums at the beginning of the month. What a terrible thread to stumble across at a later date. I am extremely sorry to hear this news. All the best to you and your family during this very very difficult time.
Oh Cliff.... you are in my thoughts. My condolences to you and your family.

Cliff, Im really sorry to hear the news. You and your family have my best wishes and prayers.  I havent checked in here for a long time, something told me to have a look around the forums today but I never expected this. Take care Cliff.
Cliff: Please accept my sincere condolences! My thoughts and prayers are with you at this time.
I'm very sorry to hear of your loss Cliff.  May Sue rest in peace.

Hi Cliff, I don't know you personally, I know you through your contributions to the forum and you seem like a good guy with a big heart and I'm sure Sue was the same. I'm very sorry to hear of your loss. My sincere condolences. Take care
So sorry for your loss. I don't know you or Sue (except for reading your posts) but my heart sank when I read the news. All the best.
So sorry to hear of your loss. My condolences.
Sorry for your loss cliff, my deepest condolences.
My condolences Cliff
my condolences as well, Cliff.
So sorry for your loss Cliff my condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear that, Cliff.  As someone else said---remember the good times.
Sorry for your loss Cliff.

Cliff my friend...I am so terribly sorry to hear about Sue...my deepest sympathies...I haven't been on the board for a week or more so I'm just seeing this now...If there is anything Maribeth and I can do please call...
Sorry for your loss big Cliff ?
Has anyone heard from Cliff? I have tried texting and calling, but no response. I am a little worried.
All is well. I spoke with Cliff Thursday evening & his family is by his side & spending Thanksgiving weekend together. We made plans to spend an extended weekend @ the cottage later this month.
Good to hear pikeslayer. My thoughts were with sinker too.  enjoy Thanksgiving with family.
Great. Thanks!
Does anyone have a link to an Obit for Sue if there is one? I am sure many here would like to donate if there is a charity the Family wants to support.

I would really like to thank everyone for their kind words and prayers, it means so much! I have been surrounded by family, friends and neighbors and apologize for not getting back to everyone as promptly as I should.  Sue didn't want any sort of a funeral but we will be having a celebration of life  in a couple of weeks, I will start to sort out the details this week and post it on here.  If anyone does feel they would like to make a donation in She's name, her favorite charity was The Heart and Stroke and her full name was Susan Dale Bignell  Our address for those that have been asking is:  Pikeslayer has suggested that posting my address on line isn't a good idea so please contact him for our address.  Thanks Simon!   I am still trying to process everything, it's going to take time!

Hang in there our friend. And please no apologies from you. It's good to surround yourself with close friends and Family. Reminisce about the good times you both shared over the years. It helps Cliff.
I have not been here much of late and just saw this.  Cliff, I am very sorry to hear of your loss, and pray that the Good Lord comforts you and carries you in your grief.  Doug
So sorry for your loss
Very sad Cliff, your touching words.  My condolences.
My sincere condolences Wishing you and yours comfort during this time Gordy

I just saw this now.  So sorry to hear the news.  Jeahn, the boys and I send our sincerest condolences. You and Sue will be in our thoughts and prayers.  May eternal rest be granted unto Sue and let perpetual light shine upon her.  May she rest in peace.
my condolences to you and your family big cliff
So sorry for your loss Cliff... HH
very sorry to hear cliff my condolences to you and your family
Sad news, my sincere condolences
Terrible news Cliff.  My condolences
Very sorry for your loss.
Big Cliff,  Deepest condolences in the loss of your beloved Sue, she will now watch over you from above. Very sorry for your loss.
Cliff, Deepest sympathies from Zen and I. Meely
Very sorry to hear this Cliff. "Precious in the sight of the Lord is the death of His saints"
Sorry for your loss Cliff, thoughts are with you and family.
Cliff.....  My deepest condolences to your family
Very sorry for your loss Cliff, terrible news.
I'm very sorry to hear this Cliff. You've helped me before, if I can do anything, let me know.
Cliff we're so sorry to hear this. Our deepest condolences to you and family.
sorry for your loss,all the best to you and your loved ones
I can't imagine the loss...so sorry to hear.
sorry for your loss,all the best to you and your loved ones
Oh no Cliff.  Im so sad to hear the news.  She was always so great to me and Sydney.  My deepest condolences....
My sincerest condolences Cliff.
Sorry for your loss Cliff.
So sorry Cliff, makes one think to be in your shoes, I don't know what I would do.

Thank You everyone I now have the name.  If someone knows what Cliff's last name is, could you please PM me? I want to send a donation in his wife's name to the heart & stroke foundation. I think I've found her odit; I just want to verify.  Dan.
So sorry for your loss Cliff. Stay strong.
My absolute deepest condolences to you and your family
So sorry to hear this Cliff,my condolences as well,take care of yourself.
So sorry to hear.  Deepest condolences to you and your family

I special lady my friend and I 'm sorry for your loss. I know the next little while...or longer....will be difficult for you. But eventually you will be smiling again when this all sinks in and you realize just how blessed you where to have Sue by your side. Lots of people in this world have never had anyone like her in there lives so consider yourself blessed.  Be well Cliff. Debbe and I are thinking of you both.

I'm so sorry to hear Cliff! I feel SO lucky to have met Sue even though it was a short visit. You know where I am (work and home) so please feel free to reach out if you need anything. Again I'm so sorry to hear this...
Heartfelt condolences on the loss of your beloved wife.
So sorry to hear Cliff. My condolences
Terribly sorry to hear this Cliff. Deepest condolences to you and your family.
So very sorry to hear this, my condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear this Cliff.   Fought e fight and now time to rest.   Our condolences
So sorry for your loss ,makes the heart truly hurt reading that
Omg Cliff, I am so sorry to hear this!! Lori and i send our deepest condolences. If you need anything, or there is any way at all we can help, please dont hesitate to ask!!  S.
Keep you head up.  You have a great support team here . My condolences
Sorry for your loss.  Remember the good times.
So sorry Cliff. Sounds like she was a terrific Gal. You are lucky to have had her. May she rest in peace. Peter.
I'm so sorry for your loss Cliff. You have my sincerest condolences. Her struggles are over and she is at peace. Take care, your family here is ready to do anything you need.
Cliff, I dont know what to say.. I am at a loss for words... Be Strong my friend as I know it has been a tough battle. They say it getts better over time..
Cliff, I'm sorry about your loss.
Sorry for your loss
Cliff I am so sorry to hear the  sad news. My condolences to you and your family.
So sorry for your loss. My deepest condolences
Sorry for your loss.... my condolences...
Wow, this is indeed terrible news Cliff. I am truly saddened by your loss. My deepest condolences.
Cliff, I have had the privilege to meet both you and Sue.  You are good people.  My condolences to you Cliff, she was a great lady.
I'd like to extend my condolences to you, your family and friends.

I haven't the words to express how I feel for you right now Cliff.  I too, as many others I'm sure, have lost my true soulmate in past years.  Nary a day passes without I think of her.  The cycle of life goes on and we all play our parts be they in joy or grief.  Take comfort in knowing she, with mine, has arrived in a blessed place.  Michael
I can't imagine what you are feeling, but I want to express my condolences. Hoppy (Terry).

At 10:05 this morning my beloved Sue slipped quietly and with out pain or fear to join the list of angles. She had suffered many heart attacks but survived them during the past 25 years. About two months ago she went into A-fib and attempts to correct it weren't successful but about a week ago she developed pneumonia. Up until this morning she was starting to show signs of improvement. Sadly her heart finally decided she had fought long and hard enough.  I am no longer half the man I used to be!  RIP my beloved princess
I'm so sorry Cliff.  My deepest condolences.
Very sad news Big Cliff. So sorry to hear of Sue's passing.
I'm so sorry Cliff, my deepest condolences to your family
Condolences to you, family and friends.
My absolute deepest condolences to you Cliff and your family.
So sorry to hear cliff. Words cannot describe  Deepest condolences from our family to yours
So very sorry to hear this Cliff and deepest condolences from Diane and I.  I only met Sue once but she seemed like a great lady.

I am so deeply saddened and sorry to hear this, Cliff. I never had the pleasure of meeting your wife, but I knew she meant the world to you. You have our family's deepest condolences my friend. Please take care of yourself. I know it is hard to do at times like this
Sue was one of the finest women our family has ever known. We all share your sadness my friend. Thoughts are with you and prayers for Sue's peaceful journey.  M & I will see you soon...............
I am so sorry for your loss.  vance
I am sorry for your loss
I'm so sorry Cliff
Very sorry for your loss.
Condolences cliff
That's just awful news Cliff. Very sorry to hear that, my condolences.
So sorry Cliff.
Ah Cliff, our deepest sorrows for you. But she has no pain any longer and is at peace.
Very sorry hearing this.
Big Cliff,very sorry for your loss. I pray to god that he gives you patience through these tough times.
My dear friend Cliff, our families deepest condolences on your loss. May she rest in peace.
Very sad indeed. Deepest Condolences.  Dan.
My condolences to you and your family.....
I hate threads like this.  Big guy, I am truly sorry for your loss  my friend.  Our deepest condolences to you and your son.  Heaven has another sweet angel.
My condolences.  Always Very sorry to hear about something like this.
